Package cycling

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
cycling.Stage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Stage extends Object implements Serializable
Stage --- A class to represent a stage in a race. Can contain intermediate sprints and climb checkpoints. Contains attributes: segments(ArryList) - All the segments that are in a stage type(StageType) - An enum which can be FLAT,MEDIUM_MOUNTAIN,HIGH_MOUNTAIN,TT id(int) - Unique to each stage name(String) - The name of the stage desc(String) - The description of the stage length(double) - The length of the stage startTime(LocalDateTime) - The date and time at which the stage starts state(String) - Represents if the stage is in the prep phase or waiting for results finishResults(ArrayList) - An ArrayList of the times at which riders finished the stage startTimes(ArrayList) - An ArrayList of the times at which riders started the stage
See Also:

    • findRiderResult

      public RiderResult findRiderResult(int riderId)
      Used to find a rider's result in a stage
      Parameters:
      riderId - The ID of the rider whose result you want to find
      Returns:
      The RiderResult object corresponding to the riderId. If no result is found a null value is returned

    • findRiderStart

      public RiderResult findRiderStart(int riderId)
      Used to find a rider's start time in a stage
      Parameters:
      riderId - The ID of the rider whose start time you want to find
      Returns:
      The RiderResult object corresponding to the riderId. If no start time is found a null value is returned

      Parameters:
      result - The finishing result to be inserted

    • insertSegment

      public void insertSegment(Segment segment)
      Adds a segment to the stage. Segments are inserted based on their location within the stage
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment to be added

    • concludePrep

      public void concludePrep()
      Chnages the stage state from preperation to waiting for results

    • findSegment

      public Segment findSegment(int id)
      Used to find a segment within a stage
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the segment you want to find
      Returns:
      If the segment is found, the segment object is returned. If not, a null value is returned
